name: Yandere Simulator Fates (Corrin Revelations Only)
description:
What if you could change the fates of Akademi High's student body like you can join Hoshido or Nohr in Fire Emblem Fates? This fan project will answer that for you! (A Kinetic Novel build of a Fire Emblem Fates X Yandere Simulator Crossover going down the Corrin Revelations Route.)

Will you help Ayano's Conquest for Taro-senpai's heart or is it Osana's Birthrights to gain Taro-senpai's love? That fate is yours to decide!

This is the final Christmas present I am giving to all my fans (#ThreeC). I thought I may as well publish the canonical story of Fates .A special extra is that the sprites used in the game have their own zip folder on here you can download and use yourself. Yes, All characters and some alternate outfits for the characters used in Corrin Revelations will be there ready for use outside of the game.

Yandere Simulator belongs to YandereDev. [Click here to go to his blog.]

Fire Emblem Fates belongs to Nintendo.
